Route / with `dynamic = "error"` couldn't be rendered statically because it used `revalidate: 0 fetch https://api.github.com/search/repositories?q=stars:>2000+language:javascript+language:typescript+language:python+language:java+language:go+language:rust&sort=stars&order=desc&per_page=100 /`. Troubleshooting tips:
